(Hey stupid!  Oh, I mean Jason!  You don't read your own posts do 
you?  Not that I blame you...no one can anyway.  You never posted 
your guys stood in the doorway.  WOW!  Forget that?  And, speaking of 
moding...how does Silverbolt magically know there's a bomb, and for 
that matter, know where it is?

OH!  Guess you didn't think about that either?  Another thing, why 
don't you take damage?  OH!  Another one!  So, keep it up.  I dare 
you.  Enough to moderate your worthless hide.  Oh, and that will be 
so much fun!  You know what happens when you get moderated?  There's 
a setting that makes it so I have to approve all your posts!  FUN?  
ISN'T IT?!  So if you go accusing someone of moding, and you have no 
clue about it, Jason Lind, shut the hell up.  Your the worst moder 
here.  And I mean that.  Also, when I leave the room where I set my 
charge...the blast wouldn't hit me.  OH!  Didn't think about that 
either, did ya?  Guess not.  So be silent, or be silenced)
